name: Single Shot Disaster Defender!
description:
Single Shot Disaster Defender! is a side scroller shooter game in which you'll have to protect the city bellow your ship from enemy ships within 1 minute.

The catch is you oly have one missile, and after firing it you'll have to catch it again in order to fire it again... !Be careful not to drop it! and  ¡Don't let the enemy past your ship!

The controls are listed in the game, but I guess it doesn't hurt:

A,D: movement

RightClick: Aiming towards mouse position

LeftClick: Fire Missile (While Aiming)
